com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows

Interface Flows.SuccessCapture<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of the value to be returned by the branching Flow constructed using this API.
    Enclosing class:
    Flows

    public static interface Flows.SuccessCapture<V>
    The second stage of a fluent API for defining branching Flows that respond to success/failure of the previous flow.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Flow<V> otherwise(Flow<V> failureFlow)
      Capture the Flow to be executed if the previous Flow failed.

    • Method Detail

      • otherwise

        Flow<V> otherwise(Flow<V> failureFlow)
        Capture the Flow to be executed if the previous Flow failed.
        Parameters:
        failureFlow - The flow to be executed if the previous Flow failed.
        Returns:
        The constructed branching Flow.
